containerName.description: Container name value, already specified in the task definition, to be used for your service discovery service.

containerPort.description: Port value, already specified in the task definition, to be used for your service discovery service.

port.description: Port value used if your Service Discovery service specified an SRV record.

registryArn.description: ARN of the Service Registry. The currently supported service registry is Amazon Route 53 Auto Naming Service(`aws.servicediscovery.Service`). For more information, see [Service](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/API_autonaming_Service.html)
